title: About Me
content: Hi! I'm Max, a full-stack developer transitioning from a career in architecture and computational design within the AEC (Architecture, Engineering, and Construction) industry. With a strong background in programming languages like JavaScript/TypeScript, Python and C#, I've specialised in computational designâ€”using algorithmic and rules-based approaches to solve complex building engineering problems. This includes designing automated workflows for multiple projects and creating parametric models to handle intricate geometries.

I'm eager to combine my experience in computational design and data science with software engineering, and I'm interested in exploring areas like DevOps, machine learning, and AI. I'm excited to create innovative web applications that make a positive impact and look forward to contributing to forward-thinking teams that value collaboration, continuous learning, and making a difference through technology.

title: On the Lookout For...
content: I'm seeking a role as a full-stack developer where I can leverage my skills to build useful software that empowers its users. I'm passionate about working for a business or charity that encourages collaboration and fosters learning through experimentation and continual development. My aspiration is to contribute to innovative projects that make a positive impact, utilising my background in computational design and data to create solutions that help and uplift people.

I am deeply engaged in the tech and creative communities, regularly attending meetups to connect with like-minded individuals and stay abreast of the latest developments. I am always on the lookout for meaningful open-source projects and very active on Github, regularly contributing to projects that have a social purpose or an innovative hook for me to learn something new.

title: Currently Exploring
content: I'm enhancing my skills at the Founders and Coders Software Engineering Bootcamp, an intensive programme focused on full-stack development. I'm diving deep into technologies like JavaScript, React, and Node.js, and collaborating on team projects that follow Agile methodologies and test-driven development. This experience is the most significant part of my current journey, allowing me to fully embrace a career in tech and pursue my passion for developing tools that help people.

Independently, I've been working on several projects to enhance my skills and contribute to the developer community. One of my projects, Colarity, is a colour palette generator that ensures WCAG compliance, helping developers create accessible designs quickly. This project is allowing me to delve into full-stack development using technologies like React, Node.js, and Material UI. Although this is still work in progress with a purely functional UI at the moment.

title: My Journey So Far
content: I've co-founded a web development agency called Viatora Digital, where I've been creating and implementing projects for clients in the music and arts sector utilising Vite, React, and Typescript. I have been overseeing complete project lifecycle, consistently achieving early delivery milestones, utilising Agile methodologies.

I've collaborated closely with front-end, back-end, and data engineers to develop bespoke applications and workflows that optimise design processes for clients in the AEC industry. My mathematical mindset and passion for problem-solving through mathematics, statistics, and data analytics have driven me to automate workflows and reuse scripts across projects, igniting my interest in software development.

A notable project, the Mood Time App is an event-based playlist generator, think of something that happened to you and a music genre to discover a playlist tailored to that event. This project involved integrating multiple APIs (Spotify API and OpenAI API) to set up a backend API seperate from the React front-end.

title: When I'm Off the Clock
content: Outside of my professional pursuits, I'm an avid cyclist and enjoy exploring the outdoors through hiking and rock climbing. Sports like golf and tennis keep me active. In my leisure time, I enjoy games with friends, reading, comics, novels and listening to music. I am often attending theatre productions, art shows and exhibitions. I love to travel, having been to 37 countries across all continents but Australia. Experiencing diverse cultures and exploring wildlife around the world has shaped me and continues to provide me with fresh perspectives.
